desc: Your first choice for Kahles Riflescopes, Swarovski Optics, Leica Sports Optics, Falcon Optics Riflescopes, EAW (Germany), Tier-One (UK) and Recknagel (Era-Tac) Scope Mounts, Triggertech Triggers, System Gemini, Grünig & Elmiger, MEC and TEC-HRO equipment in Canada.

layout.text: Welcome to Shooting Warehouse - the home of Leica Sport Optics
